articles.title: Stephen Balogun
articles.contents:
Stephen Balogun

              Stephen Balogun

            * {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
            }
            Hello, welcome to my personal website. I am Stephen, a Public Health Expert, Project Manager, Data Scientist and Quality Improvement Expert with more than 10 years of experience. I work with CARITAS Nigeria as the Surveillance and Epidemiology Team Lead on the 4GATES Project. I coordinate the ongoing surveillance activities on the PEPFAR supported HIV/AIDS program across 4 states in the country. I am also responsible for treatment continuity of clients. I utilize my numerous skills to ensure that program objectives are delivered timely with excellent user experience.
            My other engagements include:
            Starting in January 2022, I became one of the co-organizers of Abuja R User group
            I am involved with the International Society for Quality Healthcare (ISQua) in various capacities. I am one of the ISQua Fellowship Ambassadors, Fellowship Tutors, and Quality Improvement Expert.
            I am a Country Representative for HIFA (since 20216).
            I love to teach (R, quality improvement and management). At leisure, I enjoy company with friends, reading books and listening to music. You can find out more about me from my older website.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Stephen Balogun
